docs.text: JS-Numbers .toString() Number.parseInt(string,[ radix ]) string The value to parse . If the string argument is not a string , then it is converted to a string ( using the ToString abstract operation ) . Leading whitespace in the string argument is ignored . radix An integer between 2 and 36 that represents the radix ( the base in mathematical numeral systems ) of the above mentioned string .
docs.title: JS-Numbers

docs.text: .toString() Number.parseInt(string,[ radix ]) string The value to parse . If the string argument is not a string , then it is converted to a string ( using the ToString abstract operation ) . Leading whitespace in the string argument is ignored . radix An integer between 2 and 36 that represents the radix ( the base in mathematical numeral systems ) of the above mentioned string .
docs.title: JS-Numbers

docs.text: JS-String Props .length "Nice!" . length ; // 5 .includes(searchString) "Hello World" . includes ( "World" ); // true "Hello World" . includes ( "Potato" ); // false .toUpperCase() "hello" . toUpperCase (); // "HELLO" .toLowerCase() "NICe" . toLowerCase (); // "nice"; substring(indexStart, indexEnd) * indexStart: the position of the first character you'd like to include * indexEnd: 可省略，the position of the first character you'd like to ignore const language = "JavaScript" ; language . substring ( 1 , 4 ); //"ava" language . substring ( 4 ); //"Script" Template strings `This is a multiline string that just works!` `I am learning ${ language } ` ; .startsWith(serchString) .endsWith(searchString) const phoneNumber = "+103123456" ; phoneNumber . startsWith ( "+" ); //true phoneNumber . startsWith ( "10" ); //false phoneNumber . endsWith ( "56" ); // true .trim() var greeting = ' Hello world! ' ; console . log ( greeting . trim ()); // expected output: "Hello world!";
docs.title: JS-String

docs.text: .length "Nice!" . length ; // 5 .includes(searchString) "Hello World" . includes ( "World" ); // true "Hello World" . includes ( "Potato" ); // false .toUpperCase() "hello" . toUpperCase (); // "HELLO" .toLowerCase() "NICe" . toLowerCase (); // "nice"; substring(indexStart, indexEnd) * indexStart: the position of the first character you'd like to include * indexEnd: 可省略，the position of the first character you'd like to ignore const language = "JavaScript" ; language . substring ( 1 , 4 ); //"ava" language . substring ( 4 ); //"Script" Template strings `This is a multiline string that just works!` `I am learning ${ language } ` ; .startsWith(serchString) .endsWith(searchString) const phoneNumber = "+103123456" ; phoneNumber . startsWith ( "+" ); //true phoneNumber . startsWith ( "10" ); //false phoneNumber . endsWith ( "56" ); // true .trim() var greeting = ' Hello world! ' ; console . log ( greeting . trim ()); // expected output: "Hello world!";
docs.title: Props

docs.text: React Template 头文件 import React , { Component } from 'react' ; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' ; setState接收一个参数 handleClickOnLikeButton () { this . setState (( prevState ) => { return { count : 0 } } ) this . setState (( prevState ) => { return { count : prevState . count + 1 } // 上一个 setState 的返回是 count 为 0 ，当前返回 1 } ) this . setState (( prevState ) => { return { count : prevState . count + 2 } // 上一个 setState 的返回是 count 为 1 ，当前返回 3 } ) // 最后的结果是 this . state . count 为 3 } ...
docs.title: React🤙Template

docs.text: import React , { Component } from 'react' ; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' ;
docs.title: 头文件

docs.text: handleClickOnLikeButton () { this . setState (( prevState ) => { return { count : 0 } } ) this . setState (( prevState ) => { return { count : prevState . count + 1 } // 上一个 setState 的返回是 count 为 0 ，当前返回 1 } ) this . setState (( prevState ) => { return { count : prevState . count + 2 } // 上一个 setState 的返回是 count 为 1 ，当前返回 3 } ) // 最后的结果是 this . state . count 为 3 } ...
docs.title: setState接收一个参数

docs.text: VS-Release调试 打开项目属性 C++ => 常规 => 调试信息格式 选 程序数据库(/Zi) C++ => 优化 => 优化 选 禁止优化(/Od) 链接器 => 调试 => 生成调试信息 选 是(/Debug)
docs.title: VS-Release调试

docs.text: 打开项目属性 C++ => 常规 => 调试信息格式 选 程序数据库(/Zi) C++ => 优化 => 优化 选 禁止优化(/Od) 链接器 => 调试 => 生成调试信息 选 是(/Debug)

docs.text: VS-设置C++版本 打开项目的“属性页”对话框。 选择C/C++， 选择语言。 在C++语言标准中，从下拉控件中选择支持的语言标准，然后选择确定或应用以保存 您的更改。
docs.title: VS-设置C++版本

docs.text: 打开项目的“属性页”对话框。 选择C/C++， 选择语言。 在C++语言标准中，从下拉控件中选择支持的语言标准，然后选择确定或应用以保存 您的更改。
docs.title: VS-设置C++版本

docs.text: C++ vector vector查找元素 std :: vector < int > arr = { 5 , 4 , 3 , 2 , 1 }; int ele = 1 ; std :: vector < int >:: iterator result = std :: find ( arr . begin (), arr . end (), ele ); if ( result != arr . end ()) { for ( std :: vector < int >:: iterator it = arr . begin (); it != result ; it ++ ) { std :: cout << * it << " " ; } std :: cout << std :: endl ; for ( std :: vector < int >:: iterator it = result + 1 ; it != arr . end (); it ++ ) { std :: cout << * it << " " ; } std :: cout << std :: endl ; } sub vector < T >:: const_iterator first = myVec . begin () + 100000 ; vector < T >:: const_iterator last = myVec . begin () + 101000 ; vector < T > newVec ( first , last ); front l
docs.title: C++🤙vector

docs.text: vector查找元素 std :: vector < int > arr = { 5 , 4 , 3 , 2 , 1 }; int ele = 1 ; std :: vector < int >:: iterator result = std :: find ( arr . begin (), arr . end (), ele ); if ( result != arr . end ()) { for ( std :: vector < int >:: iterator it = arr . begin (); it != result ; it ++ ) { std :: cout << * it << " " ; } std :: cout << std :: endl ; for ( std :: vector < int >:: iterator it = result + 1 ; it != arr . end (); it ++ ) { std :: cout << * it << " " ; } std :: cout << std :: endl ; } sub vector < T >:: const_iterator first = myVec . begin () + 100000 ; vector < T >:: const_iterator last = myVec . begin () + 101000 ; vector < T > newVec ( first , last ); front l

docs.text: QT Json QJsonObject QJsonArray 构造 // 单个json对象 QJsonObject object { { "property1" , 1 }, { "property2" , 2 } }; { property1: 1, property2: 2 } * QJsonArray QJsonArray flags { QJsonObject {{ "flag1" , ui -> checkBoxFlag1 -> isChecked ()}}, QJsonObject {{ "flag4" , ui -> checkBoxFlag4 -> isChecked ()}} }; 转换 QJsonObject -> QString QJsonObject jsonObj ; // assume this has been populated with Json data QJsonDocument doc ( jsonObj ); QString strJson ( doc . toJson ( QJsonDocument :: Compact )); QJsonArray -> QString QJsonArray data ; QJsonDocument doc ; doc . setArray ( data ); QString dataToString ( doc . toJson ()); Reference 解析 Qt parsing JSON using QJsonDocument, QJsonObject, QJsonArray Qt之JSON教程
docs.title: QT🤙Json

docs.text: QJsonObject QJsonArray
docs.title: QTJson

docs.text: // 单个json对象 QJsonObject object { { "property1" , 1 }, { "property2" , 2 } }; { property1: 1, property2: 2 } * QJsonArray QJsonArray flags { QJsonObject {{ "flag1" , ui -> checkBoxFlag1 -> isChecked ()}}, QJsonObject {{ "flag4" , ui -> checkBoxFlag4 -> isChecked ()}} };
docs.title: 构造

docs.text: QJsonObject -> QString QJsonObject jsonObj ; // assume this has been populated with Json data QJsonDocument doc ( jsonObj ); QString strJson ( doc . toJson ( QJsonDocument :: Compact )); QJsonArray -> QString QJsonArray data ; QJsonDocument doc ; doc . setArray ( data ); QString dataToString ( doc . toJson ());
docs.title: 转换

docs.text: QT QShortcut Basic Usage 1 QAction copyAct = new QAction ( tr ( "&Copy" ), this ); copyAct -> setShortcut ( QKeySequence ( "Ctrl+Shift+F1" )); connect ( copyAct , & QAction :: triggered , this , & MainWindow :: copy ); 2 QShortcut shortcut = new QShortcut ( QKeySequence ( "Ctrl+Shift+F1" ), this ); connect ( shortcut , & QShortcut :: activated , this , & Mainwindow :: copy );
docs.title: QT🤙QShortcut

docs.text: 1 QAction copyAct = new QAction ( tr ( "&Copy" ), this ); copyAct -> setShortcut ( QKeySequence ( "Ctrl+Shift+F1" )); connect ( copyAct , & QAction :: triggered , this , & MainWindow :: copy ); 2 QShortcut shortcut = new QShortcut ( QKeySequence ( "Ctrl+Shift+F1" ), this ); connect ( shortcut , & QShortcut :: activated , this , & Mainwindow :: copy );

SetString ( hello . c_str (), allocator ); root . AddMember ( "Status" , strContent , allocator );
